Detailed Description

This class contains the implementation of the Obex Abstract Transport operations for the Bluetooth Obex Transport.

void BtObexTransport::Init (   )  [protected]
 

void BtObexTransport::ResolveClientAddr (  const String &  client_url,
ObexProtocolId  prot_id,
ObexOperationId  job_id
)  [virtual]
 

Extract infos from the client URL string and associate them to an ObexAddress object just created by this method.

Parameters:
client_url Server Address in URL format
prot_id Protocol which will be bound to the address
job_id Reference to associate request and response

Implements ObexAbstractTransport.

void BtObexTransport::ResolveServerAddr (  const String &  server_url,
ObexProtocolId  prot_id,
BOOLEAN  sdb_autocreate,
ObexOperationId  job_id
)  [virtual]
 

Extract infos from the server URL string and associate them to an ObexAddress object just created by this method.

Parameters:
server_url Server Address in URL format
prot_id Protocol which will be bound to the address
sdb_autocreate Check whether address can be autoregistered
job_id Reference to associate request and response

Implements ObexAbstractTransport.
